all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
Wherefore, gird up your loins and be prepared. Behold, the kingdom is yours, and the enemy shall not overcome.
Doctrine and Covenants 38:9
Quote of the Day
"Holiness to the Lord makes daily living sacred. It draws us closer and happier to the Lord and each other."
Gerrit W. Gong | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
